survey_name: Parental Satisfaction with Childcare Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from parents regarding their satisfaction with childcare services, focusing on quality of care, communication, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of care provided by your childcare provider?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of care provided by your childcare provider?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the cleanliness and safety of the childcare facility?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the scale is balanced to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How would you rate the cleanliness and safety of the childcare facility?

questions.question_text: How often do you receive updates about your child's activities and progress?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'N/A' option if needed for parents who do not receive updates.

script.question_text: How often do you receive updates about your child's activities and progress?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the childcare service are most important to you? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse priorities.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the childcare service are most important to you? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Have you ever had any concerns or complaints about the childcare service?
questions.client_notes: Follow up with Q5a if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you ever had any concerns or complaints about the childcare service?

questions.question_text: If yes, were your concerns addressed to your satisfaction?
questions.client_notes: Only show this question if Q5 is 'Yes'.

script.question_text: If yes, were your concerns addressed to your satisfaction?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this childcare service to other parents?
questions.client_notes: This is a standard Net Promoter Score (NPS) question.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this childcare service to other parents?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the childcare service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the childcare service?

questions.question_text: How long has your child been attending this childcare service?
questions.client_notes: Use clear time ranges to avoid ambiguity.

script.question_text: How long has your child been attending this childcare service?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that the childcare staff are adequately trained and professional?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Unsure' option for respondents who may not have enough information.

script.question_text: Do you feel that the childcare staff are adequately trained and professional?

questions.question_text: What is your child's age group?
questions.client_notes: Use age ranges that align with common childcare categories.

script.question_text: What is your child's age group?
